ingredients.ingredient: 1 (2½ pound) choice or prime porterhouse steak
Moist, grey sea salt and freshly cracked pepper to taste
Moist, grey sea salt and freshly cracked pepper to taste

cookingTips: Let steak come to room temperature before cooking
Use high heat and sear 4-5 minutes per side for medium-rare
Rest meat 5 minutes before serving to retain juices
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a minimalist masterpiece—let the quality of the steak and olive oil shine. Cook it simply with just rosemary, salt, and pepper for authentic Tuscan flavor.
